<template>
  <form @submit.prevent="$emit('add-task', task)">
    <input v-model="task.title" placeholder="Enter task title" required />
    <textarea v-model="task.description" placeholder="Enter description" required></textarea>
    <button type="submit">Add Task</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      task: { title: "", description: "" },
    };
  },
  watch: {
    task(newVal) {
      // Reset form after submission
      if (!newVal.title && !newVal.description) {
        this.task = { title: "", description: "" };
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
form {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 10px;
}

input,
textarea {
  padding: 10px;
  border: 1px solid #ddd;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

button {
  background: #42b983;
  color: white;
  border: none;
  padding: 10px;
  border-radius: 5px;
  cursor: pointer;
}

button:hover {
  background: #369a6d;
}
</style>
